alert.note: Alert for Buena Vista; Cherokee; Clay; Ida; O'Brien; Plymouth; Sioux; Woodbury (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued April 07 at 7:56PM CDT until April 08 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH SATURDAY EVENING FOR WIND AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FAR SOUTHEASTERN SOUTH DAKOTA, FAR NORTHEASTERN NEBRASKA, AND PORTIONS OF NORTHWEST IOWA... ...RED FLAG WARNING WILL EXPIRE AT 8 PM CDT THIS EVENING FOR WIND AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FAR SOUTHEASTERN SOUTH DAKOTA, FAR NORTHEASTERN NEBRASKA, AND PORTIONS OF NORTHWEST IOWA... * AFFECTED AREA...In Iowa, Sioux, O`Brien, Clay, Plymouth, Cherokee, Buena Vista, Woodbury and Ida. In Nebraska, Dixon and Dakota. In South Dakota, Union. * WINDS...South 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 35 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 16 percent. * IMPACTS...Any fires that develop will likely spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is not recommended.
info.instruction: A Fire Weather Watch means that critical fire weather conditions are forecast to occur. Listen for later forecasts and possible Red Flag Warnings.

area.areaDesc: Buena Vista; Cherokee; Clay; Ida; O'Brien; Plymouth; Sioux; Woodbury
